content: Non-Void is the most difficult Non-Enemy to find and is part of his own side quest. At the end of Chapter 2, you will be told a story about a man who saved a dying fox. The man had a dream that the fox attacked his family one night and killed the fox upon waking for fear that the dream may become a reality.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Void_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Void Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-Void Location'.
The content is as follows:
Non-Void is the most difficult Non-Enemy to find and is part of his own side quest. At the end of Chapter 2, you will be told a story about a man who saved a dying fox. The man had a dream that the fox attacked his family one night and killed the fox upon waking for fear that the dream may become a reality.
